<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mask of the Banshee](/Equipment.aspx?ID=738)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=16" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Negative" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=118" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 261 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn mask

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This ice-blue half-mask is adorned with a wicked silver grin that covers the wearer's mouth, leaving the rest of the face uncovered. You gain a +2 item bonus to [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) checks.

<document level="2" id="action-584" />

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of [_wail of the banshee_](/Spells.aspx?ID=361).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

Mask of the Banshee
</title>

</traits>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 19"
pfs="Standard"
>
Mask of the Banshee (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 261 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 35,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The item bonus to Intimidation is +3. Activating a _greater mask of the banshee_ casts a 9th-level [_wail of the banshee_](/Spells.aspx?ID=361) (DC 41) affecting all living creatures in the area.
